name: Agent Control
description: Registers OpenClaw tools with Agent Control and blocks unsafe tool invocations.

serverUrl.label: Server URL
serverUrl.help: Base URL for Agent Control (example: http://localhost:8000).

agentName.label: Agent Name Prefix
agentName.help: Base name used for OpenClaw agents when registering with Agent Control.

agentId.label: Agent UUID
agentId.help: Optional fixed Agent Control UUID for single-agent deployments.

failClosed.label: Fail Closed
failClosed.help: If true, block tool invocations when Agent Control is unavailable.
